The app is simple to launch.

The app helps users to interact and help explore covid-19 cases in Asia. The app also refelcts of other underlying factors tat might be contributing to the pandemic indefinitely. This data is sourced from. 

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(covidham)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

# the data set is huge so only a few variables are selected for a more appropriate vignette

covid_data %>% filter(continent == "Asia") %>% 
  select(location, 
         date, 
         total_cases, 
         stringency_index) %>% tibble()



```
